system.description:
At 14th level, choose one of the following.

Takes One to Know One. You have advantage on saving throws made against enchantment spells and illusion spells.

Well-Worn Deception. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell using a spell slot that is one or more levels lower by spending 1 favor point. For example, you could cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f0lq2ogke9k8f1v9]{Mislead} (a 5th-level illusion spell) by using a 4th-level spell slot and 1 favor point or with a 3rd-level spell slot and 2 favor points. Once you have used this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
